February 21, 2026 @ 11:00 am
-
1:00 pm
Piano Masterclass with Jasmin Arakawa
Amelia Baptist Church
961167 Buccaneer Trail, Fernandina Beach, Florida, United States
Hailed by Gramophone for her ‘characterful sparkle’, pianist Jasmin Arakawa will teach a public masterclass on Saturday, February, 2026, from 11:00 AM – 1:00 PM.
Free
February 22, 2026 @ 5:00 pm
-
7:00 pm
Florida’s Finest featuring Amernet Quartet | Lawson Ensemble | Jasmin Arakawa, piano | Kevin Kenner, piano
Prince of Peace Lutheran Church
2600 Atlantic Ave, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
An extraordinary showcase of Florida’s finest classical talent, featuring the Amernet Quartet, the Lawson Ensemble, and acclaimed pianists Jasmin Arakawa and Kevin Kenner in a celebration of homegrown excellence.
$50
March 3, 2026 @ 7:00 pm
-
9:00 pm
Orpheus Chamber Orchestra | Marc-André Hamelin, piano
First Baptist Church
1600 8th St, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
The world-renowned, conductor-less Orpheus Chamber Orchestra brings its signature precision and collaborative energy to Amelia Island in a landmark performance featuring 11-time Grammy-nominated pianist Marc-André Hamelin.
$75
March 12, 2026 @ 2:30 pm
-
4:30 pm
String Quartet Masterclass with the Viano Quartet
University of North Florida
1 UNF Drive Building 45, Fine Arts Center, Suite 2004, Jacksonville, FL
Join us for a rare opportunity to observe a masterclass with world-renowned cellist David Finckel on February 11, 2026, from 1:30–3:30 PM in Room 1200 at the University of North Florida.
Free
March 12, 2026 @ 5:00 pm
-
6:30 pm
Meet the Musician: Zuill Bailey
Story & Song Center for Arts & Culture
1430 Park Ave., Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
Beloved by Festival audiences, Grammy Award–winning cellist Zuill Bailey returns for an engaging evening of stories, insights, and music‑making memories. Experience this world‑renowned artist up close before his performance on March 13, 2026 at Amelia Plantation Chapel.
Free
March 13, 2026 @ 7:00 pm
-
9:00 pm
Viano Quartet | Zuill Bailey, cello
Amelia Plantation Chapel
36 Bowman Rd, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
The award-winning Viano Quartet joins Festival favorite and GRAMMY-Award winning cellist Zuill Bailey for a night of chamber music synergy.
$50
April 18, 2026 @ 3:00 pm
-
4:30 pm
Family Concert: Just Jazzin’ Around with the Gary Motley Trio
Maxwell Hall at Memorial United Methodist Church
50 N 6th St, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
The Gary Motley Trio introduces young audiences to the quintessential American musical art form in this fun and interactive performance. Designed for young listeners but perfect for music lovers of all ages!
Free
April 21, 2026 @ 7:00 pm
-
9:00 pm
Khatia Buniatishvili, piano
The Preserve at The Amelia River Club
4477 Buccaneer Trail, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
A global sensation, Georgian pianist Khatia Buniatishvili brings her signature intensity and poetic power to Amelia Island for a rare, unforgettable recital.
$75
May 9, 2026 @ 5:00 pm
-
6:00 pm
Marasco Young Artists’ Concert
Memorial United Methodist Church
601 Centre St, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
Celebrate the next generation of classical stars in this inspiring concert featuring local young musicians — a vibrant new tradition of mentorship and discovery in remembrance of the Festival’s former Executive Director, Dr. Joe Marasco
Free
June 10, 2026 @ 4:30 pm
-
8:30 pm
Beethoven & Beer (4:30 PM or 7:30 PM)
Mocama Beer Company
629 South 8th St, Fernandina Beach, FL, United States
Raise a glass with the Miró Quartet at our signature casual concert blending masterful Beethoven with a relaxed brewery vibe — the perfect pairing of tradition and fun.
$50

@
5:00 pm
-

Free
Buy Tickets
Celebrate the next generation of classical stars in this inspiring concert featuring local young musicians — a vibrant new tradition of mentorship and discovery in remembrance of the Festival’s former Executive Director, Dr. Joe Marasco.
Information about participating in this concert as a performer or performer group will be announced in Fall 2025.
